term.name: pacifism
term.def: The doctrine that the highest political or social value is peace. Another meaning of pacifism - connected with the actions and views of reformers like Henry David Thoreau (1817-1862), Mahatma Gandhi (1869-1948), and Martin Luther King (1929-1968) - is the ideal of non-violence in human affairs (akin to the moral aspect of &anarchism;).
